titles.title: I was glad, very glad when they said unto me,

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I was glad, very glad when they said unto me,
"Let us go to the house of the Lord today";
There is singing, there is dancing, there is victory,
In the house of the Lord today.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Jesus will always be wonderful to me,
Jesus will always be wonderful to me,
By His wonderful grace I shall look upon His face,
Jesus will always be wonderful to me.
